Constructor Detail

SpotLight

public SpotLight(double intensity,
                 Vector3d position,
                 Vector3d lookAt,
                 double halfAngle)
Constructor for a spot light source with a given intensity and position, lookAt and halfAngle.

Parameters:
intensity - Intensity of the spot light source.
position - Position of the spot light source.
lookAt - Look at point of the spot light source.
halfAngle - Half angle of the spot light source.
Method Detail

isShadowed

public boolean isShadowed(Vector3d pos,
                          Scenery s)
Description copied from class: DirectLight
Tests if a point is shadowed by an object of the scenery Has to be implemented for all derived light sources.

Overrides:
isShadowed in class PointLight
Parameters:
pos - Position for which the shadow test is performed.
s - Scenery which might occlude the light source.
Returns:
True, if the light source is shadowed by the scenery, false if not.
